<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 139 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Solidified radiance comprises this slender, featureless wand. It sheds [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot radius and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 20 feet. After you Activate the wand, the light fades, so it only sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius. The wand returns to its original brightness each dawn.

<document level="2" id="action-1824" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _searing light_ of the appropriate level.
